ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Mid-continent Magnetoseismic Chain (McMAC) San Antonio Station
ResourceHeader.Description: San Antonio (SATX) Magnetometer Station is located in San Antonio, Texas, USA. It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the San Antonio fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Michelle Reno at Southwest Research Institute.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC San Antonio Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC San Antonio Ground Magnetometer Station
